Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge remembered fond memories in the Coliseum, including taking his then-girlfriend and now-wife there on a date and meeting future teammates like CC Sabathia and Brett Gardner.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This will mark the end of a chapter of the Yankees' history against the Athletics, including memorable games like Game 3 of the 2001 ALDS.
Others: Austin Wells' defensive development has drawn good reviews from the Yankees, including Gerrit Cole, who has been a bit picky in the past about who catches him.
